components.description:
A trident is a three-pronged spear, that appears similar to a pitchfork. Often held by Greek or Roman Gods in statues.

This emoji tends to spike in popularity during Mardi Gras.
components.title: Trident Emblem

description:
A trident is a three-pronged spear, that appears similar to a pitchfork. Often held by Greek or Roman Gods in statues.

This emoji tends to spike in popularity during Mardi Gras.
title: Trident Emblem

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Miscellaneous mark

emoji_net_data.name: trident emblem

bn:00078270n: A trident is a three-pronged spear.
A three-pronged spear somewhat resembling a pitchfork.

apple_vendor_description: The trident emblem on Apple devices is rendered with a strong, metallic sheen, evoking the power and authority of Poseidon's mythical weapon. Its three prongs are sharp and defined, catching the light with subtle highlights that showcase Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. This emoji, with its confident and commanding presence on Apple devices, often signifies strength, authority, or a connection to the sea and its mythology.
